description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It sets up the rendering of the root React component into the DOM, wraps the App component within React Router's BrowserRouter, and uses React Strict Mode for highlighting potential problems. It also imports global CSS styles and the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React components into the DOM starting at the specified root.
